content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":3241,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに洗われながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"While being washed by Rance,"},{"lineNumber":3242,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルートはどうにか、パイアールを洗っていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lute somehow kept washing Paiarl."},{"lineNumber":3243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、なかなか我慢強い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, quite patient.\""},{"lineNumber":3244,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、ではこっちもじっくりたっぷり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, then on this side too, slowly and thoroughly,"},{"lineNumber":3245,"originalJapaneseLine":"　隅々まで洗うぞーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll wash every corner!\""},{"lineNumber":3246,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、ぅん、ぁあぁっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uhn, aaah...!\""},{"lineNumber":3247,"originalJapaneseLine":"………………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":3248,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":3249,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":3250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁっ、はぁっ、はぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa, haa, haa...\""},{"lineNumber":3251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「センサー回復……はあ、夢見心地……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sensor recovery... haa, a dreamlike feeling..."},{"lineNumber":3252,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ありがとう、姉さん……姉さん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thank you, sister... sister?\""},{"lineNumber":3253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁ……うん。気持ち……よかった？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... yeah. Did it... feel good?\""},{"lineNumber":3254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、最高さ！　……どうかしたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it was the best! ...Is something wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":3255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、ええと、少し、湯あたり……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, well, a little... overheated...\""},{"lineNumber":3256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お風呂、これから入ると思うんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I think we're going to take a bath after this...\""},{"lineNumber":3257,"originalJapaneseLine":"熱っぽく蕩けた息をこぼしながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Letting out a hot, melting breath,"},{"lineNumber":3258,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルートはパイアールと共にお風呂で身体を癒した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lute healed his body in the bath together with Paiarl."},{"lineNumber":3259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では……共に参りますかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then... shall we go together?\""},{"lineNumber":3260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":3261,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城に与えられた、JAPAN式の客室で、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the JAPAN-style guest room allocated to Rance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":3262,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝倉義景は書き物をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yoshikage Asakura was doing some writing."},{"lineNumber":3263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ…………よいか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... is this good?\""},{"lineNumber":3264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よいの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it good?\""},{"lineNumber":3265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………おぉ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Oh.\""},{"lineNumber":3266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「てやーーー！　こんにちは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Teya---! Hello!\""},{"lineNumber":3267,"originalJapaneseLine":"その足元から、ぽこんとリセットが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"From by his feet, Reset suddenly appeared."},{"lineNumber":3268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おじーちゃん、難しい顔……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Grandpa, you've got a serious face..."},{"lineNumber":3269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何してたの……ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What were you doing...?\""},{"lineNumber":3270,"originalJapaneseLine":"辿々しい敬語に、義景の表情もつい、緩む。","translatedEnglishLine":"At the awkward honorifics, Yoshikage’s expression softened."},{"lineNumber":3271,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ……文をね。何通か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... some letters. A few of them.\""},{"lineNumber":3272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふみ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fumi?\" (letter)"},{"lineNumber":3273,"originalJapaneseLine":"「手紙だよ。国許の者に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They are letters. To those in my homeland,"},{"lineNumber":3274,"originalJapaneseLine":"　色々と伝えなければならないことがあってね」","translatedEnglishLine":"there are various things I must convey.\""},{"lineNumber":3275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":3276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すまないが、もう一通書かなくてはならないのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, but I have to write one more letter."},{"lineNumber":3277,"originalJapaneseLine":"　構わないかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I hope you don't mind.\""},{"lineNumber":3278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見てていい？　ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Can I watch?\""},{"lineNumber":3279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「退屈でないならね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you're not bored.\""},{"lineNumber":3280,"originalJapaneseLine":"硯で墨を用意して、筆で書いていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"He prepared ink with the inkstone and started writing with the brush."},{"lineNumber":3281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":3282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむよし、できた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, done."},{"lineNumber":3283,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……退屈だっただろう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...You must be bored, right?\""},{"lineNumber":3284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ううん。今度は難しい顔……しなかったね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No. This time you didn’t have a serious face.\""},{"lineNumber":3285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ？　…………ふむ。そうか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? ...I see."},{"lineNumber":3286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　娘に宛てたものだったせいかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe it's because it was addressed to my daughter.\""},{"lineNumber":3287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「娘さん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A daughter?\""},{"lineNumber":3288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ。親子で近況や……時々に感じた事。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. We exchange recent news as parent and child... and sometimes things we felt."},{"lineNumber":3289,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相手を思う気持ちを綴る……そういう事もある」","translatedEnglishLine":"We write down feelings thinking of the other... such things happen.\""},{"lineNumber":3290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................!\""},{"lineNumber":3291,"originalJapaneseLine":"キラキラとした目いっぱいに好奇心を詰め込んで、","translatedEnglishLine":"With eyes sparkling full of curiosity,"},{"lineNumber":3292,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットが義景を見上げていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset looked up at Yoshikage."},{"lineNumber":3293,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………ふむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":3294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おとーーーーさーーーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Daaaaddddy!\""},{"lineNumber":3295,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":3296,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This!\""},{"lineNumber":3297,"originalJapaneseLine":"長方形に畳まれた紙を、","translatedEnglishLine":"A paper folded into a rectangle,"},{"lineNumber":3298,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットは満面の笑みで突きだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset thrust it forward with a big smile."},{"lineNumber":3299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何だコレ……果たし状か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is this... a challenge letter?\""},{"lineNumber":3300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「フミ！　だよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a letter!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに洗われながら、
ルートはどうにか、パイアールを洗っていく。
「がはははは、ではこっちもじっくりたっぷり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, then on this side too, slowly and thoroughly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「センサー回復……はあ、夢見心地……
ありがとう、姉さん……姉さん？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it was the best! ...Is something wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……お風呂、これから入ると思うんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I think we're going to take a bath after this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 熱っぽく蕩けた息をこぼしながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Letting out a hot, melting breath,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルートはパイアールと共にお風呂で身体を癒した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lute healed his body in the bath together with Paiarl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に与えられた、JAPAN式の客室で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the JAPAN-style guest room allocated to Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝倉義景は書き物をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yoshikage Asakura was doing some writing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てやーーー！　こんにちは！」
その足元から、ぽこんとリセットが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From by his feet, Reset suddenly appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辿々しい敬語に、義景の表情もつい、緩む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the awkward honorifics, Yoshikage’s expression softened.
"Hmm... some letters. A few of them."
"They are letters. To those in my homeland,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々と伝えなければならないことがあってね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are various things I must convey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すまないが、もう一通書かなくてはならないのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, but I have to write one more letter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 硯で墨を用意して、筆で書いていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He prepared ink with the inkstone and started writing with the brush.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううん。今度は難しい顔……しなかったね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. This time you didn’t have a serious face."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘に宛てたものだったせいかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it's because it was addressed to my daughter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ。親子で近況や……時々に感じた事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. We exchange recent news as parent and child... and sometimes things we felt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手を思う気持ちを綴る……そういう事もある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We write down feelings thinking of the other... such things happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キラキラとした目いっぱいに好奇心を詰め込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With eyes sparkling full of curiosity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットが義景を見上げていた。
「おとーーーーさーーーーん！」
長方形に畳まれた紙を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A paper folded into a rectangle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットは満面の笑みで突きだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset thrust it forward with a big smile.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
